arStrings.szText:
After spending {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Mana, your next cast of {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} or {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds and restores {c_number}[{SF_2} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Mana.

This Mana cost requirement is reduced by Mana Cost Reduction bonuses.
Spending Mana empowers {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} and {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c}.
